name: frontend
description: Frontend architecture approaches — from Multi-Page Apps through Single Page Apps, Server-Side Rendering, Islands Architecture, and Micro-Frontends. Covers the full spectrum of client-side concerns: routing, state management, data fetching, code splitting, and hydration.
author: Tyler-R-Kendrick

references.title: MDN Web Docs — Web Technology for Developers
web.dev — Building for the Modern Web
